hard: Helios – Daredevil’s “Big Badda Boom!” skill can crit and if it crits Helios will deal a lot of damage to her. Also, Daredevil has a built-in critical chance for the mobile version.
Corvus – Corvus’ altar can deal a lot of damage to Daredevil because Daredevil has a lot of aoe damage.
soft: Armor artifact – Daredevil is a physical damage dealer. Use armor artifact to deny damage to her.
